name: Allmageddon
effect: Unique

name: Aqua Shield
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Sacrifice Aqua Shield: Heal 15 damage to target Creature.

name: Arias
effect: Support: Power 5 (This Creature has an additional 5 Power for each adjacent OverWorld Creature you control.)
If you think he looks angry now, you should have been at the nose-piercing!

name: Ario
effect: Invisibility: Strike 15 (This Creature deals an additional 15 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Though not in his prime, Ario is always primed for battle.

name: Ash Torrent
effect: Challenge Power 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Attacat
effect: Swift 1 (This Creature may move one additional space.)
"A ferocious warrior - when he finally gets up the nerve to battle."

name: Barath Beyond
effect: Fire 5 (Fire attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
Intimidate: Power 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Power.)
Recklessness 5 (When this Creature plays an attack, it deals 5 damage to itself.)

name: Biondu
effect: Invisibility: Strike 15 (This Creature deals an additional 15 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
The Mipedian desert may be home, but Biondu covets the land beyond the sand.

name: Blazier
effect: 1MC: Look at the top two cards of target player's Location Deck. Put one of them on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.
This small, scrappy spy maps enemy territory for the OverWorld's warriors.

name: Blügon
effect: Water 5 (Water attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
The Frozen - mysterious creatures who inhabit Glacier Plains - count Blügon as their friend.

name: Bodal
effect: Support: Wisdom 5 (This Creature has an additional 5 Wisdom for each adjacent OverWorld Creature you control.)
The trouble with Bodal is that Bodal is troubled.

name: Borth-Majar
effect: Intimidate: Power 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Power.)
Intimidate: Wisdom 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Wisdom.)
Brains or brawn? One can't decide... and one doesn't need to.

name: Brathe
effect: Invisibility: Strike 15 (This Creature deals an additional 15 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Because invisible Mipedians cast no reflection, Brathe's vanity is a dangerous thing.

name: Canon of Casualty
effect: Deal 20 damage to target Creature.
Even before the first three notes finish playing, OverWorlders scramble for the nearest shelter.

name: Cascade Symphony
effect: Target creature takes 5 less damage from Air or Fire attacks.
"There is but one true language, and that is Mugic. All else is gibberish."

name: Castle Bodhran
effect: At the beginning of combat, each player may return a Mugic Card from their discard pile to their hand.
This strange stronghold is built in a style that might best be called "bizzarechitecture."

name: Castle Pillar
effect: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged creature has higher Wisdom than the opposing engaged creature, it gains a Mugic counter.
Unique

name: Chaor
effect: 3MC: Negate target OverWorld Mugic or ability that targets Chaor.
Unique, Loyal
"We'll take Kiru City and the UnderWorld will rule all of Perim!"

name: Chorus of the Hive
effect: Activate Hive.
What repels some attracts others. Is preference learned or ingrained?

name: Coil Crush
effect: Stat Check Power 75: Choose a Battlegear equipped to an opposing Creature and destroy it.

name: Cordac Falls
effect: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures gains 5 Energy.
Cordac's teardrops plunge into the abyss with nary a splash or spray...

name: Cordac Falls Plungepool
effect: At the beginning of combat, deal 5 damage to engaged Creatures.
...and strike the lake miles below, exploding outwards into the fray.

name: Crawsectus
effect: Earth 5 (Earth attacks made by this Creature deal an additional 5 damage.)
His hard exterior hides an even harder interior.

name: Crystal Cave
effect: If an engaged Creature has lower Speed than the opposing engaged Creature, it deals 0 damage on its first attack.
The ancient Mugicians mined the hardest substance in all of Perim to protect their mystical melodies.

name: Cyclance
effect: Sacrifice Cyclance: Equipped Creature gains Air until the end of combat.

name: Dardemus
effect: Intimidate: Courage 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Courage.)
This UnderWorld prison guard has a simple policy that works: whip first, whip fast, whip last.

name: Decrescendo
effect: Deal 5 damage to target Creature.
Minimalism to the max.

name: Degenervate
effect: Water: Opposing Creature loses 25 Courage, Power, Wisdom, and Speed. Your engaged Creature loses Water.

name: Delerium
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 50: Deal 5 damage.

name: Diamond of Vlaric
effect: Sacrifice Diamond of Vlaric: Equipped Creature gains Earth until the end of combat.

name: Discord of Disarming
effect: Destroy target Battlegear.
As his Windstrider decomposes into shrapnel, Bodal calculates that it will take 56.4 seconds before he splats on the ground.

name: Donmar
effect: 1MC: Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
Deciphering the Runic Grove's mysterious markings is Donmar's devotion... and the likely cause of his dementia.

name: Doors of the Deepmines
effect: At the beginning of combat, Creatures with Water gain 10 Energy.
In a rare sign of solidarity, all four tribes guard the massive doors, hoping they never open again.

name: Dractyl
effect: Range (This Creature may move though occupied spaces.)
Swift 1 (This Creature may move one additional space.)
The high-flying OverWorld messenger and spy.

name: Dragon Pulse
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 25 Courage.

name: Drakness
effect: Mugic played by Creatures you control that deal damage deal an additional 5 damage.
Unique
Trust not your own shadow—for Drakness dwells there before he strikes.

name: Dranakis Threshold
effect: Mugic and abilities cannot be played.
The few who have survived utter nary a word of what lies beyond.

name: Ektospasm
effect: Stat Check Power 50: Deal 5 damage.

name: Ekuud
effect: Hive: Ekuud has an additional 5 Energy for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play. (Hive must be activated.)
"Fear the enemy, yes. But fear me more!"

name: Elixir Of Tenacity
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 10 Courage and an additional 10 Speed.
If equipped Creature has at least 50 Power, it has an additional 10 Energy.

name: Ember Flourish
effect: Heal 15 damage to target Creature with  Air or Fire.
No matter how many you carry with you, a song can never weigh you down.

name: Ember Swarm
effect: Fire: Opposing engaged Creature loses 25 Wisdom.

name: Evaporize
effect: Challenge Courage 15: Heal 10 damage.

name: Everrain
effect: Water attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
Damage dealt by Earth attacks is reduced by 5.
Lake Ken-I-Po seeps through the UnderWorld ceiling in an unending reminder of the OverWorld's aqueous bounty.

name: Eye of the Maelstrom
effect: When Eye of the Maelstrom becomes the active Location, each player discards a Mugic Card.
No wind, no sound - just madness.

name: Fanfare of the Vanishing
effect: Target Creature gains "Invisibility: Strike 15" until the end of the turn.
When a melody becomes memory, it will never disappear.

name: Fear Valley
effect: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged Creature has lower Courage than the opposing engaged Creature, it loses 10 Energy.
One night here means a lifetime of nightmares.

name: Fearocity
effect: Stat Check Courage 75: Deal 10 damage.

name: Flame Orb
effect: Stat Check Power 75: Deal 10 damage.

name: Flash Kick
effect: Look at the top two cards of your Location Deck. Put one of them on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.

name: Flash Mend
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 50: Heal 5 damage.

name: Flashwarp
effect: Challenge Power 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Flux Bauble
effect: At the beginning of combat, look at the top two cards of your Location Deck. Put one of them on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.

name: Forest of Life
effect: At the beginning of combat, if an engaged creature has higher Power than the opposing engaged creature, it gains 5 Energy.
A place of perpetuity: nothing is born or perishes within.

name: Formicidor
effect: Hive: Formicidor has an additional 10 Courage for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play. (Hive must be activated.)
Because he dares to roam the UnderWorld, Formicidor knows secrets even some UnderWorlders do not.

name: Fortissimo
effect: Target Creature gains 5 Courage, Power, Wisdom, Speed, and Energy.
Large is good. Larger is better. But really, really big is sometimes best.

name: Frafdo
effect: Support: Courage 5 (This Creature has an additional 5 Courage for each adjacent OverWorld Creature you control.)
This winged warrior makes his nest at Castle Bodhran.

name: Frost Blight
effect: Stat Check Speed 75: Deal 10 damage.

name: Galin
effect: Hive: Galin has an additional 10 Speed for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play. (Hive must be activated.)
Galin believes he can speak with his Danian ancestors, who have yet to tell him anything of much use.

name: Gauntlets of Might
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 25 Power.

name: Geo Flourish
effect: Heal 15 damage to target Creature with Earth or Water.
Protect the land and the land will protect you.

name: Gespedan
effect: Support: Speed 5 (This Creature has an additional 5 Speed for each adjacent OverWorld Creature you control.)
Swift 1 (This Creature may move one additional space.)
No matter how swiftly Gespedan sprints, he can't outrun his, one tragic mistake.

name: Ghuul
effect: Range (This Creature may move though occupied spaces.)
Swift 1 (This Creature may move one additional space.)
"How many more until you're satisfied, Mommark? Every mistake grows their number!"

name: Gigantempopolis
effect: At the beginning of combat, engaged OverWorld Creatures gain a Mugic counter.
The ancient beings who once dwelled here faded into oblivion - proving indisputably that size doesn’t matter.

name: Glacier Plains
effect: UnderWorld Mugic Cards cost an additional Mugic counter to play.
This frozen, remote region is as harsh and forbidding as the UnderWorld's Lava Pond.

name: Gloomuck Swamp
effect: Earth attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
Damage dealt by Fire attacks is reduced by 5.
For very different reasons both Crawsectus and Antidaeon choose to call this murky mess home.

name: Gothos Tower
effect: Creatures not named Lord Van Bloot have 10 less Courage.
Lord Van Bloot has "Invisibility: Strike 15".
The horrific home of the harrowing Lord Van Bloot.

name: Grook
effect: Intimidate: Power 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Power.)
"Mugic? Bah! What can a Mugician do that I can't do with my fists?"

name: H'earring
effect: 1MC: Look at the top three cards of target player's Location Deck and put them back in any order.
Perhaps the most effective of the UnderWorld spies, H'earring mainly puts his supersonic skills to work for himself.

name: Heptadd
effect: Heptadd may play Mugic of any tribe.
Unique, Loyal
Some in Perim believe that Heptadd knows where the Cothica is.

name: Hive Call
effect: You may remove a Mugic counter from a Creature you control. If you do, activate Hive.

name: Hota
effect: "Hota is the least ‘Danian’ Danian I know."

name: Hymn of the Elements
effect: Target Creature gains an Elemental Type of your choice.
All elements stem from nature—as does the Cothica itself.

name: Ibiaan
effect: Hive: Ibiaan has an additional 5 Wisdom for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play. (Hive must be activated.)
"If Ibiaan's so smart, why is he still a Mandiblor?"

name: Incinerase
effect: Fire: Your engaged Creature loses Fire until the end of turn.

name: Inferno Gust
effect: Challenge Speed 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Interlude of Consequence
effect: Shuffle target player's Attack Deck or Location Deck.
In desperate situations, turmoil and confusion can be one's allies.

name: Intress
effect: Water 5 (Water attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
The secret behind Maxxor's bond with Intress is also the wedge that keeps them apart.

name: Iron Balls
effect: Only Generic Mugic may be played.

name: Iron Pillar
effect: Battlegear have no abilities.
The frequent quakes that rock the UnderWorld are blamed on the instability of this once-might prop.

name: Junda
effect: 1MC: Activate Hive.
Every Mandiblor aspires to be a Squadleader. So, even while Junda faces the enemy, he's also watching his back.

name: Kannen
effect: 1MC: Activate Hive.
Sacrifice Kannen: Return a Mandiblor card from your discard pile to any open space.
"My life is my tribe!"

name: Kebna
effect: Hive: Kebna has an additional 5 Energy for each Mandiblor you control  and each Infected Creature in play. (Hive must be activated.)
There's a fine line between bravery and insanity. Kebna crosses that line daily.

name: Kerric
effect: Range (This Creature may move though occupied spaces.)
Swift 1 (This Creature may move one additional space.)
Provides crucial aerial surveillance of the Cordac Plungepool.

name: Khybon
effect: Intimidate: Courage 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Courage.)
Intimidate: Wisdom 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Wisdom.)
"Yeah, I could build that."

name: Kiru City
effect: OverWorld Creatures have an additional 10 Energy.
The majestic capital of the OverWorld is named in memory of one of its greatest leaders.

name: Klasp
effect: Recklessness 5 (When this Creature plays an attack, it deals 5 damage to itself.)
Sacrifice Klasp: Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
If you find yourself seeing eye-to-eye with Klasp, it means you previously had not.

name: Krekk
effect: Intimidate: Power 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Power.)
Range (This Creature may move though occupied spaces.)
"Fear is a great motivator. Just look at Krekk."

name: Kughar
effect: Intimidate: Power 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Power.)
On bad days, Kughar is angry, furious, and enraged. On good days, he's just angry and furious.

name: Laarina
effect: “I don’t steal; I liberate lost valuables. And the only problem I have with what I do is the possibility of getting caught.”

name: Lake Ken-I-Po
effect: Mugic cannot be targeted by Mugic or Abilities.
Above the placid waters, Najarin's castle towers. A dim light flickers... and a mystery is born.

name: Lava Pond
effect: Fire attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
Damage dealt by Air attacks is reduced by 5.
Creatures named Magmon have "Fire 5".

name: Lhad
effect: Unless we become one,

name: Lightning Burst
effect: Air: Opposing engaged Creature loses 25 Power.

name: Liquilizer
effect: Sacrifice Liquilizer: Equipped Creature gains Water until the end of combat.

name: Lord Van Bloot
effect: While a Creature engaged with Lord Van Bloot has less than 65 Courage, that Creature has 10 less Energy.
Unique, Loyal
"I may serve Chaor, but in time, Chaor will serve me!"

name: Lore
effect: 1MC: Deal 10 damage to target Creature and heal 10 damage to Lore.
Unique
As a spirit leader of the Danians, many believe this shaman may one day lead his tribe to the Cothica.

name: Lucky Shot
effect: If your engaged Creature has lower Courage, Power, Wisdom, and Speed than the opposing engaged Creature, deal 40 damage.
Unique

name: Maglax
effect: Earth 5 (Earth attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
Mommark's monstrous creation has one thing going for him: a magnetic personality!

name: Magmon
effect: Fire 5 (Fire attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
Recklessness 5 (When this Creature plays an attack, it deals 5 damage to itself.)
Magmon's demeanor will melt your heart... after burning through the rest of you.

name: Mallash
effect: Hive: Mallash has an additional 5 Energy for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play. (Hive must be activated.)
"Irresponsible? It's self-preservation."

name: Malvadine
effect: Invisibility: Strike 10 (This Creature deals an additional 10 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Invisibility: Surprise (This Creature wins initiative checks against Creatures without Invisibility.)

name: Marquis Darini
effect: Creatures you control with Invisibility deal an additional 5 damage with their first attack each combat.
Unique
Proponent of peace but staunch defender of Mipedian sovereignty.

name: Maxxor
effect: 1MC: Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
Unique, Loyal
No OverWorlder has ever seen Maxxor's face in battle because he is always in the frontline, leading the charge!

name: Megaroar
effect: Stat Check Courage 70: Deal 10 damage.
Stat Check Power 70: Deal 10 damage.
Stat Check Wisdom 70: Deal 10 damage.
Stat Check Speed 70: Deal 10 damage.
Unique

name: Melody of Malady
effect: Target engaged Creature gains 10 Energy. Deal 5 damage to another target engaged Creature.
"A little bit more for me, a little bit less for you. Perfect!"

name: Melody of Mirage
effect: Target attack deals 0 damage.
Trust your ears, not your eyes.

name: Miklon
effect: After the "accident," Khybon crafted the gyropod that keeps this prison guard on patrol.

name: Minor Flourish
effect: Heal 10 damage to target Creature.
"Anyone can imitate a melody, but to hear it in one's head for the very first time... that is a gift."

name: Mipedian Cactus
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Wisdom.
If equipped Creature is Mipedian, it has "1MC: This Creature can move to any space on the board as if it were adjacent."

name: Mipedim Oasis
effect: Mipedian Creatures deal an additional 10 damage with their first attack.
For those struggling in the Mipedian Desert, this is a welcome sight. But it is what they can't see that will prove most dangerous.

name: Mirthquake
effect: Earth: The top card of your Location deck becomes the new active Location. Your engaged Creature loses Earth.

name: Mount Pillar
effect: When Mount Pillar becomes the active Location, activate Hive.
The Danian homeland provides vital structural support to the UnderWorld ceiling, explaining why Chaor has resisted its demolition.

name: Mowercycle
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 25 Speed.

name: Mugic Reprise
effect: Return target Mugic Card from your discard pile to your hand.
Everything that was once lost will be found again.

name: Mugician's Lyre
effect: Sacrifice Mugician's Lyre: Equipped Creature gains a Mugic counter.

name: Najarin
effect: 2MC: Return target Mugic Card from your discard pile to your hand.
Unique
“The search for the Cothica is the means to an end. But finding it may mean the end.”

name: Nauthilax
effect: Recklessness 5 (When this Creature plays an attack, it deals 5 damage to itself.)
Few UnderWorlders can swim, which makes Nauthilax crucial to Chaor's maritime intelligence gathering.

name: Nexus Fuse
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Sacrifice Nexus Fuse: Deal 15 damage to target Creature.

name: Notes of Neverwhere
effect: The active Location loses all abilities.
"If you have all that you need, you are always home."

name: Odu-Bathax
effect: Odu‐Bathax has an additional 5 Energy for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play.
Odu-Bathax is the defender of the North Gate at Mount Pillar.

name: Orb of Foresight
effect: At the beginning of combat, look at the top three cards of your Attack Deck. Put one of them on top of that deck and the other two on the bottom in any order.

name: OverWorld Aria
effect: Heal 10 damage to target OverWorld Creature. Damage dealt by Fire attacks to that Creature is reduced by 5.
Mugicians choose host Creatures along tribe affiliations.

name: Owis
effect: 1MC: Heal 5 damage to target Creature.
1MC: Heal 10 damage to Owis.
UnderWorlders have made countless attempts to breach Cordac Falls. Owis has repelled all but one... the one that haunts him.

name: Paral-Eyes
effect: Challenge Speed 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Phobia Mask
effect: Equipped Creature has "Intimidate: Courage 10" and "Intimidate: Power 10".

name: Power Pulse
effect: Challenge Power 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Prince Mudeenu
effect: Invisibility: Strike 20 (This Creature deals an additional 20 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Unique
Obsessed with controlling the Cothica, he will risk the freedom of the Mipedians to find it.

name: Prism of Vacuity
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Sacrifice Prism of Vacuity: Target Creature loses 20 Power.

name: Psimion
effect: Support: Wisdom 5 (This Creature has an additional 5 Wisdom for each adjacent OverWorld Creature you control.)
"Simple" Psimion is not... though his seeming to be so has certain advantages.

name: Pyrithion
effect: Intimidate: Courage 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Courage.)
Intimidate: Wisdom 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Wisdom.)
"Telling the truth only goes so far. But lying? That gets you where you're going."

name: Pyroblaster
effect: Sacrifice Pyroblaster: Equipped Creature gains Fire until the end of combat.

name: Quick Exit
effect: Challenge Wisdom 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Qwun
effect: Invisibility: Surprise (This Creature wins initiative checks against Creatures without Invisibility.)
With Qwun's blinding speed, using his invisibility is rarely necessary.

name: Rarran
effect: Range (This Creature may move though occupied spaces.)
A prison guard with Dardemus and Miklon, Rarran has not revealed his secret to them: he is one of Mommark's creations.

name: Ravanaugh Ridge
effect: At the beginning of combat, if a player controls an engaged Creature with Air, that player may look at the top three cards of their Attack Deck, put one of them on top of that deck and the others on the bottom in any order.

name: Refrain of Denial
effect: Negate target Mugic.
Cacophony signaled the beginning of the end of peace for the Mugicians.

name: Refrain of Denial (OverWorld)
effect: Negate target Generic or OverWorld Mugic.
"No such thing as Mugicians! Now fight!"

name: Refrain of Denial (OverWorld/UnderWorld)
effect: Negate target OverWorld or UnderWorld Mugic.
"The secret to using Mugic is to not try to solve its mysteries."

name: Rellim
effect: Support: Courage 5 (This creature has an additional 5 Courage for each adjacent OverWorld creature you control.)
"The Mill is not my only interest. I also enjoy beating on UnderWorlders."

name: Ring of Na'arin
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 10 Power and an additional 10 Wisdom.
If equipped Creature has at least 50 Courage, it has an additional 10 Energy.

name: Rip Tide
effect: Water: Opposing engaged Creature loses 25 Courage.

name: Riverland Star
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Courage.
If equipped Creature is OverWorld, it has "When equipped Creature deals Water damage, heal 5 damage to that Creature."

name: Riverlands
effect: When a Creature deals Water damage, Riverlands heals 5 damage to that Creature.
No one has yet to reach the source of the rushing waters. Could the Cothica be where it all begins?

name: Rock Wave
effect: Stat Check Wisdom 75: Deal 10 damage.

name: Rothar
effect: Intimidate: Power 10 (At the beginning of combat, Creatures engaged with this lose 10 Power.)
Recklessness 5 (When this Creature plays an attack, it deals 5 damage to itself.)
"I don't run. I don't flinch. But I don't care, either."

name: Runic Grove
effect: Only Generic Mugic may be played.
Secret symbols or a simple secret? Many have been tantalized by what remains indecipherable to this day.

name: Rustoxic
effect: Challenge Courage 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Shadow Strike
effect: Challenge Courage 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Shimmark
effect: Invisibility: Strike 10 (This Creature deals an additional 10 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Shimmark is like a footprint in the sand: quickly gone with the wind.

name: Shriek Shock
effect: Stat Check Speed 50: Deal 5 damage.

name: Siado
effect: Invisibility: Surprise (This Creature wins initiative checks against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Scout, sentry, spy: Siado is a triple threat to every Mipedian enemy.

name: Skartalas
effect: Sacrifice Skartalas: Activate Hive.
It's rumored that Skartalas has had dealings with Van Bloot and that their bitter feud is an act to hide an alliance.

name: Skeletal Steed
effect: Equipped Creature has "Range" and "Swift 1".
This Battlegear begins the game face up.

name: Skeletal Strike
effect: Challenge Courage 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Skithia
effect: Fire 5 (Fire attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
Van Bloot's most trusted aide, Skithia is also Takinom's avowed enemy.

name: Skreeth
effect: Range (This Creature may move though occupied spaces.)
Swift 1 (This Creature may move one additional space.)
Skreeth's boldness may be his undoing some day. Spineless he's not!

name: Sleep Sting
effect: Challenge Wisdom 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Slurhk
effect: As poison spreads throughout the Mipedian's body, Slurhk sneers. He will enjoy reclaiming his desert homeland - one lizard at a time.

name: Sobtjek
effect: 1MC, Sacrifice Sobtjek: Deal 25 damage to target Creature.
Few Mipedians can outlast Sobtjek in a parfkew eating contest.

name: Solvis
effect: 2MC: Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
The proof of the theory of natural selection or devolution defined?

name: Song of Asperity
effect: Target Creature gains "Fire 5" and "Air 5".
When anger is all-consuming, hatred is the gateway to a hideous power.

name: Song of Deflection
effect: Change the target of target Mugic or ability with a single target.
Beauty is in the ears of the beholder - even discordant notes sound harmonious in dire situations.

name: Song of EmberNova
effect: Deal 10 damage to target Creature with Air or Fire.
Fire consumes air, suffocating the earth.

name: Song of Focus
effect: Target Creature gains 10 Courage, Power, Wisdom, and Speed.

name: Song of Fury
effect: Deal 10 damage to target Creature.  Another target Creature gains "Fire 5".
"My legs or my Mugician? There is no choice. Cut them off!"

name: Song of Futuresight
effect: Look at the top two cards of target player's Attack Deck or Location Deck. Put one of them on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.
Take care when peering into the future. Sometimes it is best to not know what comes.

name: Song of GeoNova
effect: Deal 10 damage to target Creature with Earth or Water.
Forsake the land and the land will forsake you.

name: Song of Mandiblor
effect: Target Creature gains 5 Courage, Power, Wisdom, and Speed for each Danian in play.
Listen and learn the true strength of the Danian tribe—when you face one, you contend with all.

name: Song of Recovery
effect: Heal 10 damage to target Creature. That Creature gains "Air 5".
Tiaane believes that each Mugic is but a small piece of a great opus.

name: Song of Resistance
effect: All damage dealt by attacks to the caster is reduced by 5.
Even the proudest Danian would never deny a chance to harden his shell.

name: Song of Resurgence
effect: Heal 20 damage to target Creature.
"Our understanding of Mugic is the direct inverse of our gratitude for its existence."

name: Song of Revival (UW)
effect: Return target UnderWorld Creature Card in your discard pile to play in any open space.
The Mugicians believed that anything that once was cannot be lost forever.

name: Song of Stasis
effect: Target Creature cannot move.
A melody has the power to move you... or not.

name: Song of Surprisal
effect: Target Creature gains "Range" and "Swift 1".
The usefulness of Mugic in battle is but a side effect. Its true purpose remains unknown.

name: Song of Symmetry
effect: Target engaged Creature gains 10 Energy. Deal 10 damage to another target engaged Creature.
Your strength is now mine, my weakness is now yours!

name: Song of Treachery
effect: Target Creature loses 15 Courage, Power, Wisdom, and Speed.
One cannot move forward if one's always watching one's own back.

name: Song of Truesight
effect: Target creature loses Invisibility.
A melody may help you see things more clearly, so how can sound be invisible?

name: Spectral Viewer
effect: When equipped Creature becomes engaged, Creatures engaged with it lose and cannot gain Invisibility.

name: Spirit Gust
effect: Stat Check Courage 50: Deal 5 damage.

name: Squeeze Play
effect: Look at the top two cards of your Attack Deck. Put one of them on top of that deck and the other on the bottom.

name: Staff of Wisdom
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 25 Wisdom.

name: Staluk
effect: Earth 5 (Earth attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
Swift 1 (This Creature may move one additional space.)
This Mommark creation is slow to start... and difficult to stop.

name: Stone Mail
effect: Equipped Creature cannot move.
Equipped Creature has an additional 50 Energy.
All damage dealt to equipped Creature is increased by 5.
Equipped Creature has no abilities and cannot gain abilities.

name: Stone Pillar
effect: Engaged UnderWorld Creatures pay 1 less Mugic counter to play their first Mugic this turn.
Without the Pillars there would be no Over and Under, but simply one World.

name: Storm Tunnel
effect: Air attacks deal an additional 5 damage.
Damage dealt by Water attacks is reduced by 5.
Even those who cannot fly do so here.

name: Stronghold Morn
effect: At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures gain Fire, Water, Air, and Earth.
Unique

name: Swarm Song
effect: Deal 15 damage to target Creature.
The insects eclipsed the sun, turning day to night.

name: Takinom
effect: Sacrifice an UnderWorld Creature: Heal 25 damage to Takinom.
Swift 1
Takinom unearthed a shocking secret bond with her archenemy Intress that she's wisely kept from Chaor...

name: Talisman of the Mandiblor
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Speed.
If equipped Creature is Danian, it has "Sacrifice this Creature: Return a Mandiblor from your general discard pile to play in any open space."

name: Tangath Toborn
effect: 1MC: Heal 10 damage to Tangath Toborn.
"I battle because I must. But in my heart, I know that war is not the answer."

name: Tartarek
effect: 1MC: Target Creature gains "Swift 1".
Brave enough to take on any battle, wise enough to avoid most.

name: Telekinetic Bolt
effect: Challenge Courage  15, Challenge Wisdom 15: Deal 10 damage and heal 10 damage.

name: Tiaane
effect: 1MC, Sacrifice Tiaane: Deal 25 damage to target Creature.
Tianne has studied Mugic with Najarin himself and is respected throughout the OverWorld.

name: Tornado Tackle
effect: Air: Both players shuffle their Attack Decks and Attack Discard piles together.

name: Torrent Krinth
effect: Equipped Creature has "Water 5" (Water attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)

name: Torwegg
effect: Equipped Creature has "Air 5" (Air attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)

name: Toxis
effect: Recklessness 5 (When this Creature plays an attack, it deals 5 damage to itself.)
A resident of the Pits outside the UnderWorld prison. Escapees beg to return to their cells after encountering Toxis.

name: Trills of Diminution
effect: Target engaged Creature loses all abilities.
Even the simplest sounds can resonate in one's mind.

name: Ubliqun
effect: 1MC: Ubliqun can move to any space on the board as if it were adjacent.
When this unseen warrior takes to the air, look out. But you'll see nothing... until it's too late!

name: Ulmar
effect: 1MC: Deal 10 damage to target Creature.
Takinom thinks that Chaor's "go-to" guy for Battlegear has a screw loose himself.

name: UnderWorld City
effect: Attacks played by Underworld creatures have "Challenge Power 15: Deal 5 damage."
Not known for his creativity, Chaor nevertheless won the capital-naming contest for which he was also the judge.

name: UnderWorld Colosseum
effect: Creatures with Fire deal an additional 10 damage on their first attack.
UnderWorlders have a simple way of settling arguments here: the one left standing is always right.

name: Unsanity
effect: Challenge Wisdom 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Uro
effect: Invisibility: Strike 5 (This Creature deals an additional 5 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Invisibility: Surprise (This Creature wins initiative checks against Creatures without Invisibility.)

name: Valanii Levaan
effect: Hive: Valanii Levaan has an additional 10 Power for each Mandiblor you control  and each Infected Creature in play. (Hive must be activated.)
When his Squadleaders don't execute orders, Valanii Levaan orders executions.

name: Velocitrap
effect: Challenge Speed 15: Deal 10 damage.

name: Velreth
effect: Swift 1 (This Creature may move one additional space.)
Velreth is easy to find: just follow the path of destruction.

name: Vidav
effect: 1MC: Heal 15 damage to target Creature.
The Treaty of Vidav could have brought peace to the warring tribes of Perim... if only its leaders had been willing to accept it.

name: Viledriver
effect: Equipped Creature has "Fire 5" (Fire attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)

name: Vine Snare
effect: Earth: Opposing engaged Creature loses 25 Speed.

name: Vinta
effect: Invisibility: Strike 10 (This Creature deals an additional 10 damage with its first attack each combat against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Many trespassers have felt the breath of Vinta as they breached the Mipedim Oasis. But they have felt it too late.

name: Vlaric Shard
effect: Equipped Creature has "Earth 5" (Earth attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)

name: Vlaric Shard
effect: Equipped Creature has "Earth 10" (Earth attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)

name: Wamma
effect: Hive: Wamma has an additional 5 Energy for each Mandiblor you control and each Infected Creature in play. (Hive must be activated.)
Most Mandiblors are diligent, dedicated warriors. Wamma is not like most Mandiblors.

name: Whepcrack
effect: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Power.
If equipped Creature is UnderWorld, it has "Fire 5".

name: Windslash
effect: Your opponent turns all face‐down Battlegear Cards they control face up.

name: Windstrider
effect: Equipped Creature has "Swift 2".
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.

name: Wooden Pillar
effect: OverWorld Mugic Cards cost an additional Mugic counter to play.
The Runic Grove takes root here, and UnderWorlders believe it grows even further down than up.

name: Xaerv
effect: Air 5 (Air attack damage dealt by this Creature is increased by 5.)
"You got Xaerved."

name: Xield
effect: Deal 10 damage to Xield: Target Creature gains 10 Energy. This ability can only be used once per turn.
When the arrows shattered against his back, Xield knew he had found his calling.

name: Yokkis
effect: Support: All Disciplines 5
He may look funny from a distance, but get too close and the joke's on you.

name: Zalic
effect: 1MC: Heal 15 damage to Zalic.
This confidant of Intress never sleeps, so Maxxor has appointed him guardian of the Passage between the OverWorld and the UnderWorld.

name: Zaur
effect: "'Failure' is such a harsh word. Let's just say my experiment had unintended consequences."

name: Zhade
effect: Invisibility: Surprise (This Creature wins initiative checks against Creatures without Invisibility.)
Some lead. Some follow. Zhade is content to just hang around.
